description:
Tailor-made for tackling gnarly trails and epic singletrack. The lenses cut glare and reduce eye-strain so you can focus on your ride.

  • Polarized lenses cut glare and keep vision clear in challenging conditions
  • Floating frame means you should be able to get them back if they fall in
  • Deep lenses block harsh UV
  • Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses
  • 6-base curvature helps block light coming in at angles
  • Rubberized nose pads reduce slippage
  • 2-tone frame detailing
name: MEC Jib Sunglasses - Unisex
